metadata.Meta description: Discover the latest Netscape packages for Red Hat Linux 6.x, addressing security issues in Javascript and form signing. Obtain valid RPMs and fix the 75dpi font directory error with our comprehensive update, signed with GnuPG for enhanced security.

Discover the latest Netscape packages for Red Hat Linux 6.x, Intel architecture, addressing security issues in JavaScript and form signing. Learn about the fix for the 75dpi font directory error and the verification process using MD5 sum for enhanced security.

Stay updated with the latest Red Hat security advisory on Netscape packages for Red Hat Linux 6.x, addressing Javascript and form signing security problems. Obtain the necessary RPMs and verify packages with GnuPG keys for enhanced system security.

Stay informed about the latest Red Hat security advisory regarding Netscape packages. Learn about the security fixes for JavaScript and form signing, and find detailed instructions for updating the packages. Verify package integrity using MD5 sums and GnuPG keys for enhanced security.
